Title: An Act Changing the Name of the Ozamis City National Emergency Hospital in the City of Ozamis to Mayor Hilarion A. Ramiro, Sr. General Hospital
Data:
BATAS PAMBANSA Blg. 777
An Act Changing the Name of the Ozamis City National Emergency Hospital in the City of Ozamis to Mayor Hilarion A. Ramiro, Sr. General Hospital
Section 1. The name of the Ozamis City National Emergency Hospital in the City of Ozamis is changed to Mayor Hilarion A. Ramiro, Sr. General Hospital.
Section 2. This Act shall take effect upon its approval.
Approved: April 13, 1984
